alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 9:08PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of southeastern Missoula, northeastern Granite and west central Powell Counties through 1000 PM MST... At 908 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Bonner-West Riverside to 14 miles southeast of East Missoula. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-quarter mile or less and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 114 and 152. Highway 200 E between mile markers 3 and 26, and near mile marker 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
